protocol.text: Approximately 1 ¼g of total RNA was processed to produce biotinylated cRNA targets using the MessageAmp™ II-Biotin Enhanced Single Round aRNA Amplification Kit (Ambion) according to the manufacturer's instructions.

Approximately 80 mg from 7 day old, light grown ga-1 (SALK_109115)  mutant seedlings were mock-treated for 1h, collected and ground to a fine powder under liquid Nitrogen. Samples were lysed in separate groups in RLT buffer (Qiagen).Total RNA was extracted from the tissue lysate using an RNeasy kit (Qiagen).

Approximately 80 mg from 7 day old light grown ga-1 (SALK_109115)  mutant seedlings were treated with 100¼M GA3 for 1h, collected and ground to a fine powder under liquid Nitrogen. Samples were lysed in separate groups in RLT buffer (Qiagen).Total RNA was extracted from the tissue lysate using an RNeasy kit (Qiagen).

Approximately 80 mg from 7 day old, light grown gid1a-1 gid1b-1 gid1c-2  mutant seedlings were mock-treated for 1h, collected and ground to a fine powder under liquid Nitrogen. Samples were lysed in separate groups in RLT buffer (Qiagen).Total RNA was extracted from the tissue lysate using an RNeasy kit (Qiagen).

Approximately 80 mg from 7 day old light grown gid1a-1 gid1b-1 gid1c-2  mutant seedlings were treated with 100¼M GA3 for 1h, collected and ground to a fine powder under liquid Nitrogen. Samples were lysed in separate groups in RLT buffer (Qiagen).Total RNA was extracted from the tissue lysate using an RNeasy kit (Qiagen).
